text: Sun God or Solar deity refers to the divine personification of the Sun, a heavenly body in the solar system of the Milky Way. In various paganisms of the world, there were many deities associated with the sun. * Greek mythology - Helios and Apollo * Hindu mythology - Surya * Egyptian mythology - Ra * Meitei mythology - Korouhanba, Sanamahi and Nongshaba * Japanese mythology - Amaterasu Category:Gods and goddesses
title: Sun God
